      • getHopper

        public Hopper getHopper()
        Gets the hopper involved with this transfer. Use instanceof to Check if it is a HopperBlock or HopperMincart.
        Returns:
        The Hopper.
        See Also:
        HopperMinecart, HopperBlock

      • isInputting

        public boolean isInputting()
        Is the transfer inputting into the Hopper?
        Returns:
        True if the item is being transferred into the hopper.

      • isOutputting

        public boolean isOutputting()
        Is the transfer outputting into the Hopper?
        Returns:
        True if the item is being transferred out of hopper.

      • getItemTransferred
